item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a simple responsive theme for Hugo based on Read Only template by HTML5UP. To install Me just run inside your new Hugo project: $ mkdir themes $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/aerohub/hugo-me-theme.git me See README for more information.
